definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
representative/delegate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4],名[ming2]/to represent/to stand for/on behalf of/in the name of
a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties)/age/era/period/CL:個|个[ge4]
to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position/to act as an agent or proxy/surrogate/(computing) proxy
to hand over/to explain/to make clear/to brief (sb)/to account for/to justify oneself/to confess/(coll.) to finish

sentences.english: After P3 generation, cells presented in uniform morphology.
sentences.chinese: P3代以后，细胞形态较单一。

sentences.english: The attorney's horn lies horizontally in the thorns .
sentences.chinese: 代琇律师的号角水平地躺在荆棘中。

sentences.english: Say hello to Mr. Wang for me.
You create a new project that deals with requirements for a new starship generation.
sentences.chinese: 您需要为一个新的起始代，创建一个新项目。

sentences.english: I'll replace the ideal gas law for those two T's.
sentences.chinese: 用理想气体定律代进去。

sentences.english: Perform any operational duties for the organization or its affiliates.
sentences.chinese: 代组织或其机构履行运营职责。

sentences.english: You talk about the thymus gland revivifying over the course of a couple of generations.
sentences.chinese: 你们谈到胸腺复活超过一大代人结合的过程。

sentences.english: Modern magic fictions , seemingly absurd though, possess the essence of an intense reality-orientation.
sentences.chinese: 代魔幻小说虽看似荒诞但也有着很强的现实指归性。

sentences.english: Instead of stopping when the policeman shouted, he ran away.
sentences.chinese: 既然他病了，我就代他去吧。

sentences.english: Daedalus and his son Icarus were prisoners on the island of Crete.
sentences.chinese: 代达罗斯和他的儿子伊卡洛斯是克里特岛上的囚犯。
或者我得说，代你向她问好。

sentences.english: The rubber surface can be easily maintained, preserving the desks for future generations.
sentences.chinese: 橡胶面也很容易保养，下代学生可接着使用。

sentences.english: It reacted with amides to give corresponding selenoamides in fairly good yields.
sentences.chinese: 它与酰胺反应以较好的产率给出相应的硒代酰胺。

sentences.english: Objective To study advantages or disadvantages of total cystectomy and W shape orthotopic ileal neobladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨膀胱全切原位W形回肠代膀胱术优缺点。

sentences.english: The genic express of the subunit in F1 generation had dose effects.
sentences.chinese: 亚基在F1代的基因表达存在剂量效应。

definition: from generation to generation/generation after generation
three generations of a family/the three earliest dynasties (Xia, Shang and Zhou)
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)

Five Dynasties, period of history between the fall of the Tang dynasty (907) and the founding of the Song dynasty (960), when five would-be dynasties were established in quick succession in North China
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
